com.google.android.filament

类 Engine.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.filament.Engine.Config
  • 封闭类:
    Engine

    public static class Engine.Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameters for customizing the initialization of Engine.

    • 字段详细资料

      • commandBufferSizeMB

        public long commandBufferSizeMB
        Size in MiB of the low-level command buffer arena. Each new command buffer is allocated from here. If this buffer is too small the program might terminate or rendering errors might occur. This is typically set to minCommandBufferSizeMB * 3, so that up to 3 frames can be batched-up at once. This value affects the application's memory usage.

      • perRenderPassArenaSizeMB

        public long perRenderPassArenaSizeMB
        Size in MiB of the per-frame data arena. This is the main arena used for allocations when preparing a frame. e.g.: Froxel data and high-level commands are allocated from this arena. If this size is too small, the program will abort on debug builds and have undefined behavior otherwise. This value affects the application's memory usage.

      • driverHandleArenaSizeMB

        public long driverHandleArenaSizeMB
        Size in MiB of the backend's handle arena. Backends will fallback to slower heap-based allocations when running out of space and log this condition. If 0, then the default value for the given platform is used This value affects the application's memory usage.

      • minCommandBufferSizeMB

        public long minCommandBufferSizeMB
        Minimum size in MiB of a low-level command buffer. This is how much space is guaranteed to be available for low-level commands when a new buffer is allocated. If this is too small, the engine might have to stall to wait for more space to become available, this situation is logged. This value does not affect the application's memory usage.

      • perFrameCommandsSizeMB

        public long perFrameCommandsSizeMB
        Size in MiB of the per-frame high level command buffer. This buffer is related to the number of draw calls achievable within a frame, if it is too small, the program will abort on debug builds and have undefined behavior otherwise. It is allocated from the 'per-render-pass arena' above. Make sure that at least 1 MiB is left in the per-render-pass arena when deciding the size of this buffer. This value does not affect the application's memory usage.

      • jobSystemThreadCount

        public long jobSystemThreadCount
        Number of threads to use in Engine's JobSystem. Engine uses a utils::JobSystem to carry out paralleization of Engine workloads. This value sets the number of threads allocated for JobSystem. Configuring this value can be helpful in CPU-constrained environments where too many threads can cause contention of CPU and reduce performance. The default value is 0, which implies that the Engine will use a heuristic to determine the number of threads to use.

      • textureUseAfterFreePoolSize

        public long textureUseAfterFreePoolSize
        Number of most-recently destroyed textures to track for use-after-free. This will cause the backend to throw an exception when a texture is freed but still bound to a SamplerGroup and used in a draw call. 0 disables completely. Currently only respected by the Metal backend.

      • disableParallelShaderCompile

        public boolean disableParallelShaderCompile
        Set to `true` to forcibly disable parallel shader compilation in the backend. Currently only honored by the GL backend.

      • stereoscopicType

        public Engine.StereoscopicType stereoscopicType
        The type of technique for stereoscopic rendering. This setting determines the algorithm used when stereoscopic rendering is enabled. This decision applies to the entire Engine for the lifetime of the Engine. E.g., multiple Views created from the Engine must use the same stereoscopic type. Each view can enable stereoscopic rendering via the StereoscopicOptions::enable flag.
        另请参阅:
        View.setStereoscopicOptions(com.google.android.filament.View.StereoscopicOptions)

      • stereoscopicEyeCount

        public long stereoscopicEyeCount
        The number of eyes to render when stereoscopic rendering is enabled. Supported values are between 1 and Engine#getMaxStereoscopicEyes() (inclusive).
        另请参阅:
        View.setStereoscopicOptions(com.google.android.filament.View.StereoscopicOptions), Engine.getMaxStereoscopicEyes()

      • resourceAllocatorCacheSizeMB

        public long resourceAllocatorCacheSizeMB

      • resourceAllocatorCacheMaxAge

        public long resourceAllocatorCacheMaxAge

      • disableHandleUseAfterFreeCheck

        public boolean disableHandleUseAfterFreeCheck

      • preferredShaderLanguage

        public Engine.Config.ShaderLanguage preferredShaderLanguage

      • forceGLES2Context

        public boolean forceGLES2Context

    • 构造器详细资料

        public Config()
